alert.note: Alert for Barton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:56PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Barton County through 1015 PM CDT... At 955 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just north of Otis, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hoisington, Albert, Olmitz, Galatia, Susank, Cheyenne Bottoms and Odin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central Kansas.
